channel.title: quarantine on Dustin's Corner
channel.description: Recent content in quarantine on Dustin's Corner

item.title: Quarantine Life
item.description: Disclaimer: This post is mostly just me rambling. The past few months have been different, an almost unrecognizable blur of time and alcohol. In this time, I have thought about different aspects of myself and my life, analyzing what it really means to be “me”. Before COVID-19 and quarantine, my life was still a blur of time, but it lacked the reflection of self that being boarded up at home offers.
